segments.text: I see the little girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just expecting her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even touching the stool, just standing there patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too young to understand the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is the one in danger, but she’s just happy about the cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop the plate he’s holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so cute, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before they finish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is both sweet and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
